price: Mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, Twaremye umuntu mu ntanga zivanze (iz’umugabo n’iz’umugore), kugira Tuzomugerageze mu kwubahiriza amabwirizwa, Turaheza Tumugira uwumva, abona, kugira azobazwe ku co yumvise no ku co yabonye.
arabic: إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ أَمۡشَاجٖ نَّبۡتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرًا

meta.transliteration: innā khalaqnā al-insāna min nuṭ'fatin amshājin nabtalīhi fajaʿalnāhu samīʿan baṣīran
